resources.string: NFC Crypto Payment system , By CheckM8 and PeterKrulis
This example emulates a type-4 tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\nIt uses an aid-filter D2760000850101 for the APDU SELECT command. (This is just a TEST !)
This app reads an NDEF message from an emulated NFC tag using Ndef protocol.
This app reads an NDEF message from an emulated NFC tag using IsoDep protocol and low level API.

This example expects a class 4 type tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\nIt uses an aid-filter D2760000850101 for the APDU SELECT command.\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all pages will be read.

This application emulates an NFC card with an NDEF tag (sender) and a receiver for this NDEF tag (reader). Please choose with the menu below.\n\nThis app is using the official AID D2760000850101 for a tag that contains an NDEF message.
